segments.text: Hi , I was wondering how I'd go about getting a credit card .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Certainly , Sir . You do have a Current Account with us right ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , no , I'm afraid I don't . Is that necessary ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , Sir . In order to get a credit card with us , you'll need to open a Current Account here . Could you please fill out this form with your relevant details ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's done . Do you need to see any credentials ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , a passport will be fine .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don't have my passport on me at the moment . I'll just pop back to my office and pick it up .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's fine , Sir . We'll see you again a little later .
segments.speaker: S2
